description: This men’s wool dress sock is crafted from sustainable ZQ-certified Merino wool for an incredibly great-feeling, great-fitting, great-looking result. Made to be durable, these socks are constructed with comfort-fit features that will make your feet happy throughout the day. Plus, the sharp color block patterns are eye-catchingly attractive.
name: Smartwool Everyday Blocked Stripe Crew Socks - Mens
